name: Mermaid
description: This DevContainer feature installs and configures the Mermaid CLI to generate diagrams from `.mmd` files. It sets up a non-root user and a Puppeteer configuration that allows rendering Mermaid diagrams in headless mode.

userName.description: Specify the username under which Mermaid CLI will run.

puppeteerConfigDir.description: Directory to store Puppeteer configuration files.
